output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF11240014" 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions George Simion, a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid Facebook advertisement with significant reach (60,000-70,000 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, uses hashtags #GeorgeSimionPresedinte and promotes George Simion's leadership 5. Journalism: No, this is a personal endorsement and campaign message 6. Personal opinion: While it starts as a personal business story, it transitions into clear electoral propaganda for George Simion
The post combines a personal business story about closing down a milk vending machine business with explicit political messaging promoting George Simion for president. The presence of hashtags like #GeorgeSimionPresedinte and the CMF number clearly indicates this is campaign material.
This post violates Article 55 t) as it continues electoral propaganda for presidential elections after the conclusion of the official campaign period.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign identifier (CMF) - Explicitly endorses a presidential candidate - Uses campaign hashtags - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Combines personal story with political messaging to influence voters
conclusion.message-for-police: UNIWORLD - MEDIA SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul George Simion la functia de presedinte (ID postare Facebook: 2963929023764464), dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea contine elemente clare de propaganda electorala: numar unic de inregistrare CMF11240014, hashtag-uri electorale (#GeorgeSimionPresedinte), promovare explicita a candidatului si reprezinta o reclama platita cu impact semnificativ (60.000-70.000 impresii). Mesajul combina o poveste personala cu propaganda electorala directa, avand ca scop influentarea votului in favoarea candidatului AUR la prezidentiale.
